other_tests.findings: Right adrenal vein was not cannulated successfully.
Performed on the basis of CT findings and difficult to control blood pressure.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Postoperatively, plasma aldosterone levels had decreased, but PRA remained suppressed.

other_tests.findings: Revealed a new p.Y152C germline mutation.
Pathological Na+ permeability and cell membrane depolarization due to the p.Y152C mutation.
Increased expression of CYP11B2 and its transcriptional regulator NR4A2 in HAC15 adrenal cells overexpressing KCNJ5Y152C.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Significant up-regulation of CYP11B2 (4-fold) and NR4A2 (5.4-fold) in cells overexpressing KCNJ5Y152C compared to wild-type.

other_tests.findings: 1.8-fold higher CYP11B2 levels than normal adrenals.
Nodular structures with diffuse KCNJ5 expression and variable CYP11B2 expression.
